manifest.name: Local images
manifest.description: Local Images plugin finds all links to external images in your notes, then downloads and saves images locally, and finally adjusts the image links in your notes to point to the saved image files.
manifest.author: catalysm, aleksey-rezvov

data.manifestValue: Local Images plugin finds all links to external images in your notes, then downloads and saves images locally, and finally adjusts the image links in your notes to point to the saved image files.
data.communityListValue: Find all links to external images in your notes, download and save images locally, and adjust the image links in your notes to point to the saved image files.
